item.description:
IMPORTANT!!!
EVENT DETAILS HAVE CHANGED!

Mike Faiella only has authorization for the campaign to be on campus between the hours of 11:00 AM and 2:00 PM on Wednesday. He requests that those who are available to help, honor the time restrictions.

Voter registration at DW College.
This week, to kick this off, we will have help from Bob Dwyer of SE Mass., who has successfully presented a college outreach at several places in Massachusetts. We have advice from Mike Faiella, the campaign's official college outreach person in NH, who will be preparing the ground for us earlier in the day with an outreach effort.

This is a great opportunity to help the campaign (GOTV) and get some experience and teaching from experienced people.

Please volunteer for this activity if you possibly can.
We will do this for approximately 3 hours (11:00 AM to 2:00 PM)
item.name: DW College outreach
